SalesOrderItem.description: The SalesOrderItems array cannot be null and cannot be an empty array.

Sku.description:
Maps to the field Products.ProductId in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed

Quantity.description:
Maps to the field SalesOrderItems.Quantity in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Zero values: not allowed

OrderLineValue.description:
The total price due in the customer's currency for the Sku, after discounts, including tax. For example, if the customer has purchased 3 x ABC123 which cost 1.00 each after tax and discounts, OrderLineValue will be 3.00.
Null values: not allowed
Zero values: allowed

OrderLineTaxValue.description:
The total amount of tax due in the customer's currency for the Sku. For example, if the OrderLineValue is 3.00 and tax is 20%, OrderLineTaxValue will be 0.50.
Null values: not allowed
Zero values: allowed
